name: pyrolytic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to or caused by pyrolysis (= a process in which substances are changed chemically by high temperatures) : The cracks in the pot lids indicate that pyrolytic damage probably occurred post-production. Mechanical valves are made of a virtually indestructible substance called pyrolytic carbon.
More examplesFewer examplesSelf-cleaning ovens use pyrolytic decomposition to oxidize dirt. Research showed that pyrolytic wastes in Irish waters were higher than permitted by the EU directives. The oven features a pyrolytic self-cleaning cycle that burns off all the dirt and grease.
